name: Full Metal Jump
description:
This is my entry for the Trijam #155 game jam, this is a game jam where you have 3 hours only to create a complete game. The theme of this jam was Gameplay under 1 minute.

Be sure to click on full screen for best experience.

Use WASD keys to move your player around the screen. Collect the blue shield orbs to add a shield so that you can survive the impact when you hit the ground. Avoid the Drones as they will decrease your shield percentage.

I live streamed the entire creation of this game on Youtube for anyone that would like to check it out you can see the replay here.

CREDITS:

Music provided by http://nosoapradio.us/

Font provided by fonts.google.com

Everything else was created by MetalStorm
